text: Calvin William Verity, Jr. (January 26, 1917 â€“ January 3, 2007) was an American administrator and steel industrialist. He served as the Secretary of Commerce between 1987 and 1989, under President Ronald Reagan. He died on January 3, 2007, a complications of pneumonia, in Beaufort, South Carolina, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:United States Secretaries of Commerce Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: William Verity Jr.
